execution_quality: Limited effectiveness—agent made an edit attempt but the follow-up messages show critical failures (PassCmd errors, account skipping) indicating the initial fix didn't resolve the underlying authentication/configuration issues.

summary: Agent attempted a single edit to address email folder sorting issues, but the follow-up failure messages (PassCmd errors, account skipping) reveal the fix was superficial or misdirected. The agent did not diagnose the underlying authentication/configuration problem causing accounts to fail, leaving the user with broken email accounts rather than resolved sorting issues.
follow_up_pattern: User reported critical failures (PassCmd producing no output for ncsu and live accounts), indicating the configuration change didn't address the root cause. Likely expected agent to diagnose authentication or configuration problems rather than applying a surface-level fix.
